Classification component-wise boosting learner

mlr_learners_classif.compboost.Rd

A Learner for a component-wise boosting model implemented in Compboost in package compboost.

Super classes

mlr3::Learner -> compboost::LearnerCompboost -> LearnerClassifCompboost

Methods

Public methods

  • LearnerClassifCompboost$new()

  • LearnerClassifCompboost$clone()

Inherited methods

  • mlr3::Learner$base_learner()

  • mlr3::Learner$format()

  • mlr3::Learner$help()

  • mlr3::Learner$predict()

  • mlr3::Learner$predict_newdata()

  • mlr3::Learner$print()

  • mlr3::Learner$reset()

  • mlr3::Learner$train()

  • compboost::LearnerCompboost$importance()

  • compboost::LearnerCompboost$save_json()

  • compboost::LearnerCompboost$selected_features()

Method new()

Creates a new instance of this R6 class.

Usage

LearnerClassifCompboost$new()

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

LearnerClassifCompboost$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

Examples

l = lrn("classif.compboost", baselearner = "components",
  df = 5, iterations = 20)
task = tsk("german_credit")
l$train(task)
l$selected_features()
#> [1] "status_ridge"
